name: TestCloud
help: Test Cloud is a cloud based service consisting of thousands of physical mobile devices. Users upload their apps and tests to Test Cloud, which will install the apps on the devices and run the tests. When the tests are complete, Test Cloud, the results made available to users through an easy to use and informative web-based front end.

properties.name: AssemblyDirectory
properties.help: The path to the folder holding the test assemblies.

properties.name: Devices
properties.help: The device ID that was provided in the Test Cloud Upload dialog.

properties.name: UserEmail
properties.help: The e-mail address of the team member submitting the tests.

properties.name: NunitResultsFile
properties.help: The filename to which test results are exported, formatted as NUnit results XML. Optional.

properties.name: SignInfoFile
properties.help: Android only. Supply a signing information file that will be used to sign the Test Server APK. See the section below for more details. Optional.

properties.name: DsymFile
properties.help: iOS only. Will upload the dSYM files along with the application and tests. This allows for more detail in the log files. Optional.

properties.name: Fixtures
properties.help: NUnit fixture / namespace to run. (Can be used multiple times).

properties.name: IncludeCategories
properties.help: Identifies the NUnit test categories that should only be included in the test run.

properties.name: ExcludeCategories
properties.help: Identifies the NUnit test categories that should be excluded from the test run.

properties.name: TestChunk
properties.help: Run tests in parallel by method.

properties.name: FixtureChunk
properties.help: Run tests in parallel by fixture.

properties.name: DataPaths
properties.help: Uploads file or directory along with assemblies. (Can be used multiple times).
